summary.title: ecommerce-threat-model
summary.description: A web-based e-commerce platform that allows users to browse products, manage a shopping cart, and perform secure payments using credit cards or third-party providers like PayPal.

diagrams.title: ecommerce-system-overview
diagrams.description: This diagram represents the overall architecture of the e-commerce platform, including users, frontend, backend services, payment gateway, and database.
